typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SurveyTransactionId as long,
		ApplicationSourceId as integer,
		Guid as string,
		SurveyId as integer,
		SurveyDescription as string,
		StartSurveyDateTime as string,
		CustomerNumber as string,
		Q01 as string,
		Q02 as string,
		Q03 as string,
		Q04 as string,
		Q05 as string,
		Q06 as string,
		Q07 as string,
		Q08 as string,
		Q09 as string,
		Q10 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select * from vwADF_GDMPhotoTaking\n',
	format: 'query') ~> SurveyTransaction
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select Number, Name from vwADF_EdsGdmCustomers',
	format: 'query') ~> Customers
SurveyTransaction, Customers join(CustomerNumber == Number,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinToCustomer
JoinToCustomer sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkToData
